caption.title: Visualization of GB atoms and surface after the PCA; Red and blue dots indicate the GB atoms and non-GB atoms respectively.
caption.p: (a) Front view of GB surface. (b) Side view of GB surface. It can be observed that the surface is not perfectly flat. (c) Mass spectrum of the GB, the majority of ions are Al 2+ or Al +; In contrast to the spectrum of the bulk, the peak of O + is absent.
